td.a: Video from the Teachers/Staff to the Students

td.br:
On Wednesday, April 8, 2020, we will have Home Learning Packets available for pick up for any student enrolled at University View Academy-Tallulah Campus. Pre-Kindergarten – Grade 11.
To comply with the social distancing, STAY AT HOME order, we ask that only one person exits a vehicle to pick up packets. Please pick up one packet per child/per grade.
 These home learning packets are optional.
 Students will not receive a grade.
 The packets do not need to be turned back in to the school.
